landingPage.title: Your personal radar for open-source projects
landingPage.subtitle: Find projects that match your skills, track your contributions, and build your developer profile in the open-source community.
landingPage.disclaimer: Connect with GitHub to unlock personalized features.
landingPage.radarFooter: The projects displayed are popular in the open-source community.
landingPage.searchTitle: Discover open source projects that match your interests and skill level

footer.mainText: Discover, contribute, and grow with open-source projects that match your skills and interests.

learns.title: Learn about Open Source
learns.subtitle: Discover how to contribute to open source projects and expand your potential as a developer
learns.text2: Understand the basic concepts of the open source universe
learns.text3: Open source software is a type of software whose source code is made publicly available, allowing anyone to view, use, modify, and distribute the code as they see fit.
learns.text4: This collaborative approach enables developers from around the world to work together, share knowledge, and create better solutions through transparency and cooperation.
learns.text6: First steps to contribute to projects
learns.text7: Find a project that aligns with your interests and skills
learns.text8: Read the project's documentation and contribution guides
learns.text9: Explore issues tagged 'good first issue' or 'beginner friendly'
learns.text10: Fork the repository and clone it locally
learns.text11: Create a branch for your contribution
learns.text12: Develop your solution and test it
learns.text13: Submit a pull request with your changes
learns.text15: Why join the open source community?
learns.text17: Demonstrate your skills through real contributions
learns.text19: Connect with developers around the world
learns.text21: Learn coding practices from established projects
learns.text23: Gain recognition in the technical community
learns.text27: Be part of a community without borders
learns.text28: Contributing to open source projects is a way to overcome geographical barriers and connect with developers from all over the world. It is an opportunity to collaborate on meaningful projects and build international professional relationships.
learns.text29: Through this experience, you can expand your network, improve your English communication skills, and increase your chances of landing global remote work opportunities.

explore.text1: Discover open source projects that match your interests and skill level

explore.text8: Try adjusting your filters or using different search terms.

dashboard.text5: Please select at least one programming language

suport.text2: Help us empower developers to contribute to open source and build a stronger community.
suport.text6: Your support helps us maintain servers and develop new features for the platform.
suport.text8: Help us create more educational content to guide new contributors to open source.
suport.text10: Your donations help ensure the long-term sustainability of this free community resource.
suport.text12: Financial support isn't the only way to contribute. Here are other valuable ways you can help:
suport.text14: Share our platform with your network and help us reach more developers.
suport.text17: Help improve our platform by contributing to our open source codebase.
suport.text21: Share your ideas and suggestions to make the platform better.
suport.text25: Every contribution, no matter how small, helps us continue our work in making open source more accessible to everyone.

team.text4: By accessing or using the Open Source Radar ('platform'), you agree to these Terms of Service. If you do not agree with any part of these terms, do not use our services.
team.text6: Open Source Radar is a platform that helps developers find relevant open-source projects to contribute to, based on their skills and interests.
team.text8: To use our services, you need to log in with your GitHub account. You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account and for all activities that occur under it.
team.text10: You agree to use our platform only for lawful purposes and in accordance with these Terms. You must not:
team.text13: Attempt to access restricted areas without authorization
team.text14: Use the platform to distribute malicious content

team.text18: The platform is provided 'as is', without warranties of any kind, express or implied. We do not guarantee that the platform will be uninterrupted, secure, or error-free.
team.text20: Under no circumstances shall we be liable for direct, indirect, incidental, special, or consequential damages resulting from the use or inability to use our platform.
team.text22: We reserve the right to modify these Terms at any time. Changes will take effect immediately upon publication. Continued use of the platform constitutes acceptance of the new Terms.
team.text24: These Terms are governed by and interpreted in accordance with the laws of Brazil, regardless of its conflict of law principles.
